question: The Rashtriya Yuva Sashaktikaran Karyakram has been launched by which ministry?
option1: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
option2: Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports
answer: Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports
explanation: The Rashtriya Yuva Sashaktikaran Karyakram has been launched by the Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports to empower the youth of the country to achieve their full potential.
